content.text: Humphrey is a bartender at Sabaody Archipelago.
Humphrey is a large man with fuzzy black hair (with a bald spot in the front) and sideburns. He wears a white shirt that is unbuttoned.
Humphrey is a kind man, as he tells Nami a lot of information about the New World, but he is not very brave as he advised Nami to go along with what the Fake Straw Hat Crew were saying.

Humphrey is first seen giving a drink to Nami after she returned to Sabaody Archipelago. He gave her some information on the New World, including the relocation of Marineford. He advises Nami not to mess with the Fake Straw Hat Crew, but his bar is all but destroyed when Nami strikes it with a thundercloud.

elements.text: â†‘  One Piece Blue Deep: Characters World (p. 216), his name is revealed.
